Text: steven roseliusKen My line manager in London was Steven Roselius He is a good guy with a family and a loyal company man He is a Texan and over in London on a two year contract Now he has just rented his house out in Houston on a six month contract so has no where to live and no job He has lost K in Enron stock If you can offer him any help please do so he is under a lot of stress which he is taking quietly Regards Chris Brooksbank
